observation: Fisgard Asset Management | Building Brighter Financial Futures  Skip to content 8.00% FCC Net Cash Return 1st Quarter 2024 - Invest Today >> Invest early and retire with confidence. Speak with our experts about your investment options today! >> Investing for the first time? The sooner you start, the more you’ll save. Take your first step with a modest $1,000 initial investment >> Contact Us 1.866.382.9255 Menu close Main Menu About Us chevron-right icon Investing Financing Investor Log-In chevron-left icon Our Team Who We Are Careers Exempt Market Dealer (EMD) Fisgard Capital Corporation Investor Case Studies Investor FAQ Income Calculator Mortgage Brokers Appraisers Educational Webinars Forms Search linkedin linkedin icon facebook facebook icon instagram instagram icon A Brighter Financial Future! Investment Solutions Join thousands of Canadians and start investing in your future today. arrow icon Mortgage Financing Find flexible and creative mortgage solutions designed to support brokers and their clients. Since 1994, Fisgard Asset Management has provided investors with security, income and growth by carefully investing in quality mortgages secured by valuable Canadian real estate. Active Investments: 8.00% FCC Net Cash Return $296M+ in Assets Under 450+ Mortgages Funded 2023 Net Annualized Cash Returns 5-Year Term 7.19% 6.19% 5.19% Net annualized return is the total return that an investment earns each year for a given period. All three term options are available for registered and non-registered accounts. Invest Today We put you first. Located in beautiful Victoria, BC, we work with investors and mortgage brokers from British Columbia to Ontario. Get to Know Us For 30 years and counting, we’ve proudly taken care of our growing family of investors and our mortgage broker partners, guided by our commitment to security and stability.
